attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I can't help but feel like this should have been thought of along time ago, gardens for the homeless too grow fruits and vegetables for themselfs, or too sell, it won't stop the homeless from suffering, but it would stop alot from going hungry or getting ill from hunger, and will help towards a brighter future for everyone.

rejection.details: Please make your title a call for specific government action.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
